title: Effective office communication
brief_description: A vignette emphasises important aspects of office communication highlighting the different types of communication found in the workplace such as memos, faxes and telephone messages; the importance of two-way communication; maintaining confidentiality in some types of communication; the importance of praise and good news as a tool for motivating staff and procedures and practices to enhance communication in an organisation. A trainer’s manual accompanies the program and is available as a separate loan item.
